name: GCM (Green is the Color of Money)

screenshots.caption: Test Performance Results for Random Investment Algorithm

short_description: This software provides a testing environment for stock trading algorithms using historical data. It also offers a realtime market trading interface for tracking investments and recommending buy/sell decisions. Authors: Byron Formwalt
